name: Nuke
description: Nuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire city. It is a very powerful weapon, but it is quite dangerous. Deals 100 damage

name: Robot Dog
description: Robot dogs are mechanical robots that have the anatomical shape of a dog, these are very useful, as they can be strapped up with guns or other weapons. Deals 20 damage

name: EMP Driver Blaster
description: Able to disable/destroy any nearby devices (E.G. Communication lines,war robots,mobile phones etc.) (1 use) Deals 150 damage

name: HyperNuke
description: Hypernuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire state/province. It is a very powerful weapon, but it is also very dangerous. It is not recommended to use for testing on countryland that is not completely empty. Deals 200 damage

name: DextraNuke
description: Super Nuke is a powerful weapon that can destroy an entire country. Highly dangerous, do not even buy, or use, unless you are insane. Deals 500 damage

name: Ground Force
description: Is a force on the ground (Soldiers, Tanks, etc) Deals 10 damage

name: Navy Force
description: Is a force in the ocean (Ships, Submarines, etc) Deals 10 damage

name: Air Force
description: Is a force in the air (Airplanes, Helicopters, etc) Deals 10 damage

name: Medical Aid
description: Cures 40 HP, has a max use of 5, being able to heal 200 HP at a time

name: Lightning Sandwich
description: Cures 30 HP, has a max use of 3, being able to heal 90 HP at a time
